components.description:
An orange-colored basketball. Originally intended to display as a basketball and a hoop, as per previous designs by Google, Samsung, and Microsoft.

This emoji can be sent on Facebook Messenger to unlock a hidden basketball game.
components.title: Basketball and Hoop

description:
An orange-colored basketball. Originally intended to display as a basketball and a hoop, as per previous designs by Google, Samsung, and Microsoft.

This emoji can be sent on Facebook Messenger to unlock a hidden basketball game.
title: Basketball and Hoop

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Sport symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: An orange-colored basketball displayed with a hoop.¬†Many versions of this emoji omit¬†the hoop,¬†and display only the basketball. This emoji c http://emojipedia.org/basketball-and-hoop/
emoji_net_data.name: basketball

bn:00091708v: To perform in (a sport); to participate in (a game).
To take part in a sport's match.

bn:01505661n: The National Basketball Association is the pre-eminent men's professional basketball league in North America, and is widely considered to be the premier men's professional basketball league in the world.

bn:00008874n: A circular hoop, from which a net is suspended, which is the goal through which the players try to throw the ball.
Horizontal circular metal hoop supporting a net through which players try to throw the basketball
A backboard is a piece of basketball equipment.
The hoop, holding a string net, through which the basketball must be placed to score

bn:00008120n: Object, generally spherical, used for playing games.
A ball is a round, usually spherical but sometimes ovoid, object with various uses.
Round object that is hit or thrown or kicked in games
An object, generally spherical, used for playing games.

bn:00008889n: A person who plays basketball, especially professionally.
A basketball player; a person who plays basketball.
Basketball is a sport played by two teams of five players on a rectangular court.
A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to put a ball through a hoop.
A sport in which two opposing teams of five players strive to throw a ball through a hoop.
Sport in which teams compete to put a ball through an elevated goal (hoop)
A game played on a court by two opposing teams of 5 players; points are scored by throwing the ball through an elevated horizontal hoop
